column2: He checked his watch: 3:04 P.M. He banged on the door again, but still no one responded. Surely they would not deny him entry when he was only a couple of minutes late?
He saw the clock in the town-hall tower standing at four minutes past three on that hot and windless late-July afternoon.
Woken at 1504 by Michelangelo hammering away with his chisel.
